title: Central Park, Large Living w/Private Patio/Balcony, Pool Savings!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1057 Sq.
The Avantus is a contemporary collection of one and two-bedroom apartments for rent, situated just east of Denver’s core on Montview Boulevard.

For active professionals, The Avantus is in close proximity to Highway 225 and Highway 70 making Denver a place not just for work, but a playground for hiking, cycling, skiing, and countless other activities.
Explore the city’s natural surroundings in nearby parks and downtown attractions like walkable 16th Street, Larimer Square, the Denver Art Museum, or attend games at Coors Field and Ball Arena.
The community itself boasts a fitness center, clubhouse, and resort-style swimming pool to entertain and enjoy with family and friends.
With its accessible location and a neighborhood brimming with activity, the real Denver-ite can find a true home in The Avantus Apartments.
Don’t hesitate to discover all that awaits you at the best apartments in Denver, CO.
Stainless Steel Appliances*, Washer/Dryer*, Spacious Layout, Walk-In Closets, Air Conditioning, Dishwasher, Private Patio/Balcony, Additional Storage

Off Street Parking, Resident Clubhouse with Fire Place, Business Center, Professional & Responsive Management, Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment, Landscaped Central Courtyard, Gated Community, Pet-Friendly, Common Area Laundry Facilities, 24-Hour Fitness, Pet "Bark Park", Common Area Wifi, Kitchen and Billiards Table, Great Neighborhood, Covered Parking, Outdoor Grilling Stations, Sparkling Swimming Pool
At Avantus in Denver, we love your pets just as much as you do!
Because of that, Avantus is not just a pet-friendly property, but a pet-enthusiastic property.
Your pets will find just as inviting a home here as you will.
